channel.title: TUTORIAL Advanced on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in TUTORIAL Advanced on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Contour Example 4: Annotation of images
item.description: Contour Example 4: Annotation of images This example shows how to add annotations to an image. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Example 1: Panel for the contour filter
item.description: Example 1: Panel for the contour filter This example contains a whole package structure. Inside you can find the example contour filter for which a panel was created. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Example 2: Python scripting
item.description: Example 2: Python scripting This example shows how to create module interactions via Python scripting. Download The files need to be added to a package. You can download the example network here

item.title: Surface Example 4: Interactively moving WEM
item.description: Surface Example 4: Interactively moving WEM This example shows how to use dragger modules, to modify objects in a 3D viewer. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Surface Example 5: WEM - Primitive Value Lists
item.description: Surface Example 5: WEM - Primitive Value Lists This example shows how to use Primitive Value Lists (PVLs). With the help of PVLs the distance between the surfaces of WEMs is color coded. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Visualization Example 5: Volume rendering and interactions
item.description: Visualization Example 5: Volume rendering and interactions This example shows the volume rendering of a scan. The texture of the volume is edited and animations are implemented. Download You can download the example network here
